projects.title: TODO Web App
projects.description: Full stack web app for adding, editing and deleting todo reminders. The backend is built using Node.js, utilizing a PostgreSQL database for CRUD operations. The full web application is deployed on AWS EC2 for public access. Lastly I containerized the frontend, backend and database via Docker. The frontend is based off of a tutorial from freecodecamp.

projects.title: Holiday Checker
projects.description: Frontend only web app that displays the upcoming Canadian holiday. Implemented via single component and I added over-the-top styling for memorable user experience.

projects.title: Baseball Stats Website
projects.description: My first full stack web app. Fetches and displays selected player baseball data from public API, front-end deployed on AWS S3 storage. Back-end includes login session via JWT.
